# Pull Request Checklist

Before submitting your PR, make sure all the following are done âœ…:

- [ ] **PR linked to an Issue**  
      (e.g., `Closes #23`)  

- [ ] **Branch naming correct**  
      (e.g., `feature/meal-logger`, `bugfix/calorie-bug`)  

- [ ] **Commit messages follow rules**  
      (e.g., `feat: add intermittent fasting tracker`)  

- [ ] **Reviewer approval received**  
      (At least one team member has reviewed and approved)  

- [ ] **No merge conflicts**  
      (Branch can be merged cleanly into main)  

- [ ] **CI/CD checks passed**  
      (All automated tests, linting, and build pipelines successful)  

- [ ] **Dockerfile unchanged unless needed**  
      (Only update if your changes require it)  

- [ ] **Version bump correct (for release scenarios)**  
      (Patch / Minor / Major version update following semantic versioning)  

---

## PR Description

**What changed:**  
<!-- Describe your changes briefly -->

**Why it changed:**  
<!-- Explain why these changes were necessary -->

**Issue Reference:**  
<!-- e.g., Closes #23 -->
